cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 8th Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 8th Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: FEMALE ONLY. Dorm includes comfortable bunk beds with inner sprung mattress, pillows, and duvets, a historic sash window, USB ports and plenty of space for your luggage. Shower and toilet in the room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This room has a steady bunk with double bed on the bottom and single bed on top, can be used as double or twin. It has comfortable bedding, tasteful decorated with shelving and hooks. It has plugs to charge devices and sink with mirror.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All beds are super comfortable with a luxurious inner sprung mattress, fluffy pillows, duvets and towels. The rooms have beautiful historic sash windows, a private shower, toilet, and basin. It has plenty of storage space, a bedside table with lamp.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
